welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santana de Parnaiba, where history and charm come together in a beautiful blend of colonial architecture and traditional festivities. Enjoy your time exploring our historic streets and experiencing the unique culture of our city.

airports.airport_name: Comte. Rolim Adolfo Amaro State Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.network_name: Comte Rolim Adolfo Amaro Airport WiFi
wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, serving domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Guarulhos Airport, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Guarulhos Airport, exclusively for international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection after a certain period of time.
